name: Interview Question 1
body:
### Centeva Interview Question
For this task you will be given an initial set of source code which contains an Angular application that is served up by a local NPM server through a grunt task. You will take this source code and complete the user story described below.

### Setup
1 Fork the repository. You will push all of your commits to your forked repo.
2 Ensure that you have NPM/Node installed.
3 Run dev_env_setup.bat file from the root of the repo.

### Tips
 - Take a moment and familiarize yourself with the packages included in the source, including checking out their respective documentations. Examples include, bootstrap, angular, moment, etc. 
 - Check in frequently. Don't worry about mistakes in prior commits.

### User Story
![](https://github.com/Centeva/InterviewQuestion1/blob/gh-pages/images/mockup1.png)
![](https://github.com/Centeva/InterviewQuestion1/blob/gh-pages/images/mockup2.png)
![](https://github.com/Centeva/InterviewQuestion1/blob/gh-pages/images/mockup3.png)
![](https://github.com/Centeva/InterviewQuestion1/blob/gh-pages/images/mockup4.png)
### When Finished
Send a link to your forked repo to...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
